item.title: 4 Reasons Why House Republicans Should Pass a Clean Debt Ceiling Bill Now *UPDATE*
item.description: Yeah, I know. Obama’s childish, petulant, and tyrannical tantrums over the continuing resolution makes me want to fight like an angry cat, too. But I don’t actually want to fight. Fighting isn’t in our interest. As Sun Tzu said: Hence to fight and conquer in all your battles is not supreme excellence; supreme excellence consists in breaking the enemy’s resistance without fighting. I want to succeed in repealing Obamacare and forcing government into its constitutionally limited box.
